alert.note: Alert for Bay; Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:46PM EDT until July 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR EASTERN GENEVA...SOUTH CENTRAL HOUSTON...WESTERN JACKSON... NORTHEASTERN BAY...EASTERN HOLMES AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1246 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartford to near Vernon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Slocomb, Bradford, Malvern, Rehobeth, Cottondale, Avon, Alford, Wausau, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton and Noma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
